text: Morning John, I've been following the news about the murder case you're on. Any updates you can share? How's the evidence stacking up?
Son, I heard there might be new evidence coming in. Is it going to be a game-changer for Mr. Smith's case?
I'm proud of you, John. This case is a tough one, but I know you'll do great. Keep me posted, okay?
Just saw a piece on the news about the murder weapon being contested. What's your take on it?
Morning, John. Hope you're doing well. I'm eager to hear about the case. Let's catch up soon.
